attributes.action: Help people who lose their job through no fault of their own!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have been made redundant and got no mortgage protection. Educated myself to Degree level from the age of 16. Always worked and paid taxes. Why is it the Government won't help people like myself.If Not educated or worked I would have everything paid for. I ask for the government to help people who educate themselves, work yet when lose their job through no fault of there own why are we not helped, please state how the is correct?
The government should help to stop people losing the homes, after losing their jobs, not after 39 weeks but striaght away!!!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
